definition: To assemble various parts or components into a unified structure or object. This word is commonly used when referring to the process of putting together different elements to create something functional or complete.

examples.english: I have to assemble the shelf.
He has to assemble the model airplane.
We have to assemble the IKEA furniture.
She has to assemble the wall unit.

examples.german: Der Handwerker ist dabei, das Regal zusammenzubauen.
examples.english: The handyman is in the process of assembling the shelf.
